de.grau.organizer.database

Class EventsManagerRealm

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.grau.organizer.database.EventsManagerRealm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventsManager

    public class EventsManagerRealm
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventsManager
    Instance of database Handler Implements the EventsManager Interface Handles all actions related to the database

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the database All transactions are stopped
      boolean deleteCategory(java.lang.String categoryId)
      Removes a category for a given id
      boolean deleteEvent(java.lang.String eventId)
      Deletes an event from database for given id
      Category getCategory(java.lang.String categoryId)
      Retrieves a category by given categoryId
      Category getCategoryByName(java.lang.String category)
      Returns a RealmQuery containing one Category in database where the category name matches given name
      Category getDefaultCategory()
      Returns the default category "Allgemein"
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents()
      Returns a list of all events available in database For example used in retrieving data for ListFragment
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(com.prolificinteractive.materialcalendarview.CalendarDay calDate)
      Retrieves a List of event for given CalendarDay Used for retrieving List for a selected day in monthfragment
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(Category category)
      Retrieves all events for a given category
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate)
      Retrieves a list of events where date of start is greater than startDate and smaller than endDate
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(int year, int month)
      Retrieves a list of events where startdate lies in given year and month
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(int month, int year, int priority)
      Retrieves a list of events where startDate lies in given month and year and priority equals given priority
      java.util.List<Event> getEvents(java.util.List<Tag> tags)
      Returns a list of events for given list of tags
      io.realm.RealmResults<Event> getRealmEventList()
      Returns RealmResults of all available events stored in database Those RealmResults are still activly bound to database and can be watched via Listener
      static void init(android.content.Context context)
      Initializes database with given context This call is needed once in the lifecycle of the app There is no migration, changes to database leads to deletion of all present data
      java.util.List<Category> loadAllCategories()
      Returns a list of all categories
      java.util.List<Category> loadAllDeleteableCategories()
      Retrieves a List of all categories which are allowed to delete
      Event loadEvent(java.lang.String eventId)
      Returns a specific event via given eventID If no event was found null is returned
      void open()
      Open the database Database needs to be open for any transaction
      java.util.List<Event> searchEvents(java.lang.String search, int limit)
      Used to perform a search for events All events are returned where the field [name, description, category] contains given search string Search is limited to 50 results
      void updateCategoryOfEvent(Event event, Category category)
      Updates the category of given event
      void updateEvent(Event event_data, java.lang.String eventId)
      Updates the event specified by eventId with the data contained in event_data
      void writeCategory(Category category)
      Writes a given category to database
      void writeEvent(Event event)
      Writes the given event to database
